scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their inferred features, potentially leading to targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy of the customer churn prediction model using publicly available data.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A financial institution uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on factors like age, income, transaction history, and investment portfolio. The model is deployed as a prediction API.
